document.heading: Tenant Bill of Rights Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-147, the “Tenant Bill of Rights Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-58. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 24, 2014, and July 14, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Aug. 1, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-415 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-147 became effective on Dec. 17, 2014.
